column4: I am fairly new to linux, and whenever I try to boot up, I get the following error message:"kernel panic - not syncing: IO-APIC + timer doesn't work! Boot with apic=debug and send a report."  can anyone help?
What sort of machine are you running it on?
apic=debug will just give you more details on the brokenness. noapic might work
But the thing is, it's doing this because your hardware is broken
